checkboxes.embed_chapters: Embed ID3 chapters in joined file
checkboxes.fallback_numbering: Fallback numbering when not a playlist

tooltips.bitrate_combo: Sets the quality of the MP3 file. 192 is good quality, 320 is highest.
tooltips.browse_cookies_button: Open a file picker to select a cookies file.
tooltips.browse_output_button: Open a folder picker for the output directory.
tooltips.check_deps_button: Attempts to automatically install missing dependencies (e.g., using winget on Windows).

checkboxes.add_numbering: Prefix track numbers to filenames using playlist order (or autonumber).
checkboxes.dedup_artist: If the artist name repeats at both ends of the filename, keep only one.
checkboxes.embed_chapters: Embed chapter markers into the MP3 (when available).
checkboxes.embed_metadata: Write ID3 metadata tags into the MP3 files.
checkboxes.fallback_numbering: If playlist index missing, use autonumber to keep a consistent order.
checkboxes.include_id: Appends the YouTube video ID to the filename for uniqueness.
checkboxes.join_into_one: Enable to combine all selected/queued items into a single MP3 (album-style).
checkboxes.keep_temp_wavs: Keep intermediate WAV files (useful for debugging).
checkboxes.mp3gain_normalize: Analyze and normalize loudness using MP3Gain (writes APEv2 tags).
checkboxes.randomize_order: Randomize order before joining into a single MP3.
checkboxes.sanitize_filenames: Removes problematic characters to maximize compatibility.
checkboxes.use_archive: Use yt-dlp's download archive to skip already-processed items.
checkboxes.use_run_subdir: Creates a timestamped subfolder for this run to keep files organized.
checkboxes.validate_sr: Validate produced files with ffprobe (duration/sample rate sanity checks).
checkboxes.verbose_ydl: Enable verbose yt-dlp logging to help troubleshoot downloads.
checkboxes.vlc_segments: Create a VLC playlist that jumps to each segment/track.
checkboxes.write_cue: Write a CUE sheet for the joined album.

tooltips.cookies_browser: Use cookies from a supported browser (Chrome/Edge/Firefox).
tooltips.cookies_file_entry: A cookies.txt (Netscape format) or Cookie-Editor JSON file.
tooltips.copy_log_button: Copy the visible log text to the clipboard.
tooltips.delay_spinbox: Pauses between downloads in a playlist to avoid being rate-limited.
tooltips.join_name_entry: Name for the final joined MP3 / album.
tooltips.open_log_button: Open the latest log file in your default editor.
tooltips.output_folder_entry: Select the main folder where files, logs, and subfolders will be saved.
tooltips.paste_button: Paste the clipboard contents into this field.
tooltips.playlist_format_combo: Creates a playlist file for all downloaded tracks.
tooltips.sample_rate_combo: Enforces a consistent audio sample rate. 44100 Hz is standard for CD quality.
tooltips.url_entry: Paste the full URL of a YouTube video or playlist here. Right-click for context menu.

tooltips.verify_tools_button: Verify external tools are installed and on PATH.
